com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene

Interface IGameScene

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEngineGamescene, IExtendedGameScene, ILocalMapGamescene, ISubEngineGamescene, ITaleGamescene
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseGamescene, DialogBaseLocalMapGamescene, EngineGamescene, ExtendedGamescene, LocalMapGamescene, LocalMapGamestate.EmptyLocalMapGamescene, SubEngineGamescene, TaleGamescene

    public interface IGameScene

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Called to confirm that the given game state can be assigned to this scene.

      The controller manager for this scene.

      The camera used for this scene.
      IControlHandler getSceneControlHandler()
      The control handler for scene specific action handling.
      boolean isAssigned() 
      void onAssign()
      Called when the scene is added to the state scene control.
      void onDeassign()
      Called when the scene is removed from the state scene control.
      void onPause()
      Called when the scene is paused.
      void onResume()
      Called when the scene is resumed.
      void onStart()
      Called when the scene is set as the active scene.
      void onStop()
      Called when the scene is no longer the active scene.
      void onUpdate(long timeMillis)
      Called when the scene should be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • getGamestate

        IGameState getGamestate()
        Returns:
        The gamestate this scene is assigned to, or null if this scene has not been assigned.

      • isAssigned

        boolean isAssigned()

      • assign

        boolean assign(IGameState gamestate)
        Called to confirm that the given game state can be assigned to this scene.
        Parameters:
        gamestate - The state this scene is being assigned to.
        Returns:
        True if assignment was successful, false if not.

      • deassign

        boolean deassign()

      • onAssign

        void onAssign()
        Called when the scene is added to the state scene control.

      • onStart

        void onStart()
        Called when the scene is set as the active scene.

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        Called when the scene is paused.

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        Called when the scene is resumed.

      • onStop

        void onStop()
        Called when the scene is no longer the active scene.

      • onDeassign

        void onDeassign()
        Called when the scene is removed from the state scene control.

      • onUpdate

        void onUpdate(long timeMillis)
        Called when the scene should be updated.
        Parameters:
        timeMillis -

      • getControllerManager

        IControllerManager getControllerManager()
        The controller manager for this scene.
        Returns:
        The scene controller manager.

      • getSceneCamera

        ICamera getSceneCamera()
        The camera used for this scene.
        Returns:
        The scene camera.

      • getSceneControlHandler

        IControlHandler getSceneControlHandler()
        The control handler for scene specific action handling.
        Returns:
        The scene control handler.
